00010 #include "Jamoma.h"
00011 
00012 
00013 // Data Structure for this object
00014 typedef struct _gain{
00015         t_pxobject                      x_obj;
00016         void                            *obex;
00017         tt_crossfade            *xfade;                                                 // crossgain object from the ttblue library
00018         tt_gain                         *gain;                                                  // gain control object the ttblue library
00019         tt_audio_signal         *signal_in[2];
00020         tt_audio_signal         *signal_out;
00021         tt_audio_signal         *signal_temp;
00022         short                           num_chans;
00023         long                            attr_bypass;                                    // toggle 1 = bypass
00024         float                           attr_mix;                                               // mix in %
00025         float                           attr_gain;                                              // gain in midi units
00026 } t_gain;
00027 
00028 // Prototypes for methods
00029 void *gain_new(t_symbol *s, long argc, t_atom *argv);                           // New Object Creation Method
00030 void gain_free(t_gain *x);                                                                                      // Object Deletion Method
00031 void gain_dsp(t_gain *x, t_signal **sp, short *count);                          // DSP Method
00032 void gain_assist(t_gain *x, void *b, long m, long a, char *s);          // Assistance Method
00033 t_int *gain_perform(t_int *w);                                                                          // MSP Perform Method
00034 t_max_err attr_set_gain(t_gain *x, void *attr, long argc, t_atom *argv);
00035 t_max_err attr_set_mix(t_gain *x, void *attr, long argc, t_atom *argv);
00036 t_max_err attr_set_bypass(t_gain *x, void *attr, long argc, t_atom *argv);
00037 
00038 // Globals
00039 t_class         *gain_class;                                    // Required. Global pointing to this class
00040 t_symbol        *ps_float32;
00041 t_symbol        *ps_long;
00042 t_symbol        *ps_dumpout;
00043 
00044 
00045 /************************************************************************************/
00046 // Main() Function
00047 
00048 int main(void)                          // main recieves a copy of the Max function macros table
00049 {
00050         long attrflags = 0;
00051         t_class *c;
00052         t_object *attr;
00053         
00054         jamoma_init();
00055         ps_float32 = gensym("float32");
00056         ps_long = gensym("long");
00057         ps_dumpout = gensym("dumpout");
00058 
00059         // Define our class
00060         c = class_new("jcom.gain~",(method)gain_new, (method)gain_free, (short)sizeof(t_gain), 
00061                 (method)0L, A_GIMME, 0);
00062         class_obexoffset_set(c, calcoffset(t_gain, obex));
00063 
00064         // Make methods accessible for our class: 
00065         class_addmethod(c, (method)gain_dsp,                            "dsp", A_CANT, 0L);
00066     class_addmethod(c, (method)object_obex_dumpout,     "dumpout", A_CANT,0);  
00067     class_addmethod(c, (method)object_obex_quickref,    "quickref", A_CANT, 0);
00068     class_addmethod(c, (method)gain_assist,                     "assist", A_CANT, 0L);
00069 
00070         // Add attributes to our class:
00071         attr = attr_offset_new("bypass", ps_long, attrflags,
00072                 (method)0L,(method)attr_set_bypass, calcoffset(t_gain, attr_bypass));
00073         class_addattr(c, attr);
00074         
00075         attr = attr_offset_new("mix", ps_float32, attrflags,
00076                 (method)0L,(method)attr_set_mix, calcoffset(t_gain, attr_mix));
00077         class_addattr(c, attr); 
00078         
00079         attr = attr_offset_new("gain_midi", ps_float32, attrflags,
00080                 (method)0L,(method)attr_set_gain, calcoffset(t_gain, attr_gain));
00081         class_addattr(c, attr); 
00082         
00083         // Setup our class to work with MSP
00084         class_dspinit(c);
00085 
00086         // Finalize our class
00087         class_register(CLASS_BOX, c);
00088         gain_class = c;
00089         return 0;
00090 }
00091 
00092 
00093 /************************************************************************************/
00094 // Object Life
00095 
00096 // Create
00097 void *gain_new(t_symbol *s, long argc, t_atom *argv)
00098 {
00099         long attrstart = attr_args_offset(argc, argv);          // support normal arguments
00100         short i;
00101         
00102         t_gain *x = (t_gain *)object_alloc(gain_class);
00103         if(x){
00104                 object_obex_store((void *)x, ps_dumpout, (object *)outlet_new(x, NULL));        // dumpout
00105 
00106                 x->num_chans = 1;
00107                 if(attrstart && argv){
00108                         int argument = atom_getlong(argv);
00109                         x->num_chans = tt_audio_base::clip(argument, 1, MAX_NUM_CHANNELS);
00110                 }
00111 
00112                 dsp_setup((t_pxobject *)x, x->num_chans * 2);   // Create Object and Inlets
00113                 x->x_obj.z_misc = Z_NO_INPLACE;                                 // ESSENTIAL!                   
00114                 for(i=0; i< (x->num_chans); i++)
00115                         outlet_new((t_pxobject *)x, "signal");          // Create a signal Outlet               
00116 
00117                 x->xfade = new tt_crossfade;                                            // Constructors
00118                 x->gain = new tt_gain;
00119                 x->signal_temp = new tt_audio_signal;
00120                 x->signal_out = new tt_audio_signal;
00121                 for(i=0; i<2; i++){
00122                         x->signal_in[i] = new tt_audio_signal;
00123                 }
00124                 
00125                 x->xfade->set_attr(tt_crossfade::k_mode, 0);            // defaults
00126                 x->xfade->set_attr(tt_crossfade::k_shape, 0);
00127                 x->xfade->set_attr(tt_crossfade::k_position, 1);
00128                 x->gain->set_attr(tt_gain::k_gain_direct, 0);
00129                 
00130                 x->attr_bypass = 0;
00131                 x->attr_gain = 0;
00132 
00133                 attr_args_process(x, argc, argv);                                       // handle attribute args                                
00134         }
00135         return (x);                                                                                             // Return the pointer
00136 }
00137 
00138 // Destroy
00139 void gain_free(t_gain *x)
00140 {
00141         short i;
00142         
00143         dsp_free((t_pxobject *)x);                                      // Always call dsp_free first in this routine
00144         delete x->xfade;
00145         delete x->gain;
00146         delete x->signal_temp;
00147         delete x->signal_out;
00148         for(i=0; i<2; i++){
00149                 delete x->signal_in[i];
00150         }
00151 }
00152 
00153 /************************************************************************************/
00154 // Methods bound to input/inlets
00155 
00156 // Method for Assistance Messages
00157 void gain_assist(t_gain *x, void *b, long msg, long arg, char *dst)
00158 {
00159         if(msg==1){     // Inlets
00160                 if(arg < x->num_chans) strcpy(dst, "(signal) Raw (unprocessed) signal");
00161                 else strcpy(dst, "(signal) Processed signal");
00162         }
00163         else if(msg==2){ // Outlets
00164                 if(arg < x->num_chans) strcpy(dst, "(signal) Raw (unprocessed) signal");
00165                 else strcpy(dst, "(signal) Processed signal");
00166         }
00167 }
00168 
00169 
00170 // ATTRIBUTE: gain
00171 t_max_err attr_set_gain(t_gain *x, void *attr, long argc, t_atom *argv)
00172 {
00173         x->attr_gain = atom_getfloat(argv);
00174         x->gain->set_attr(tt_gain::k_gain, (x->attr_gain - 127) * .6);          // convert midi to db for tap_gain
00175 
00176         return MAX_ERR_NONE;
00177         #pragma unused(attr)
00178 }
00179 
00180 
00181 // ATTRIBUTE: mix
00182 t_max_err attr_set_mix(t_gain *x, void *attr, long argc, t_atom *argv)
00183 {
00184         x->attr_mix = atom_getfloat(argv);
00185         if(x->attr_bypass == 0)
00186                 x->xfade->set_attr(tt_crossfade::k_position, x->attr_mix * 0.01);
00187 
00188         return MAX_ERR_NONE;
00189         #pragma unused(attr)
00190 }
00191 
00192 
00193 // ATTRIBUTE: bypass
00194 t_max_err attr_set_bypass(t_gain *x, void *attr, long argc, t_atom *argv)
00195 {
00196         x->attr_bypass = atom_getlong(argv);
00197         if(x->attr_bypass == 0)
00198                 x->xfade->set_attr(tt_crossfade::k_position, x->attr_mix * 0.01);
00199         else
00200                 x->xfade->set_attr(tt_crossfade::k_position, 0.0);
00201 
00202         return MAX_ERR_NONE;
00203         #pragma unused(attr)
00204 }
00205 
00206 
00207 // Perform Method
00208 t_int *gain_perform(t_int *w)
00209 {
00210         t_gain *x = (t_gain *)(w[1]);                                           // Pointer
00211         x->signal_in[0]->set_vector((t_float *)(w[2]));         // Input Dry
00212         x->signal_in[1]->set_vector((t_float *)(w[3]));         // Input Wet
00213         x->signal_out->set_vector((t_float *)(w[4]));           // Output
00214         x->signal_in[0]->set_vectorsize((int)(w[5]));           // Vector Size
00215 
00216         x->xfade->dsp_vector_calc(x->signal_in[0], x->signal_in[1], x->signal_temp);    // perform bypass operation on processed input
00217         x->gain->dsp_vector_calc(x->signal_temp, x->signal_out);                                                // perform gain boost/cut on processed/bypassed input
00218 
00219         return(w+6);
00220 }
00221 
00222 
00223 // DSP Method
00224 void gain_dsp(t_gain *x, t_signal **sp, short *count)
00225 {
00226         short i;
00227         
00228         x->signal_temp->alloc(sp[0]->s_n);      // re-allocate memory associated with our temp signal vector
00229         
00230         for(i=0; i < x->num_chans; i++)         //add an instance of the perform method for each channel
00231                 dsp_add(gain_perform, 5, 
00232                         x, 
00233                         sp[i]->s_vec, 
00234                         sp[i + x->num_chans]->s_vec, 
00235                         sp[i + (x->num_chans * 2)]->s_vec, 
00236                         sp[i]->s_n 
00237                 );
00238 }
